strings.allUnlocked: Try to find every missing item, and return them to the locker, me boy!
strings.allCollected: You've collected all of the missing items me boy, but you can still explore!
strings.getkeys: Collect all 5 golden keys, to unlock the final level!
strings.trivia1: Answer the question correctly, to earn a gold key!
strings.trivia2: 5 gold keys unlock the secret level!
strings.congrats: Congratulations! You earned the GOLD KEY!
strings.tomorrow: Come back tomorrow to earn another gold key!
strings.allkeys: You have all of the keys, now the final level is unlocked!
strings.incorrect: Uh oh! That is not the right answer. You can come back and try again tomorrow!
strings.question1: In the "Lost and Found" episode. What is the first instrument that Squidward finds?
strings.question2: In the "Lost and Found" episode. How many lost children does Spongebob find?
strings.question3: In the "Lost and Found" episode. How many umbrellas are in the lost umbrella barrel?
strings.question4: In the "Lost and Found" episode. How many sea chimps with golden cymbals does Spongebob find?
strings.question5: In the "Lost and Found" episode. How many years have the lost children been in the Lost and Found?
strings.help1: Find missing locker items in each level!
strings.help2: You can stand on switches to open locked rooms!
strings.help3: Grease traps can teleport you to different areas much faster than running!
strings.help4: Watch out for sharp and moving obstacles!
strings.help5: Find the trivia box to test your knowledge and earn golden keys!
strings.help6: Find the golden key. Once you have all 5 you can explore the final level!
strings.sure: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT?
strings.achieve1: Take a short cut through a grease trap!
strings.achieve3: Find the golden item in each level.
strings.achieve4: Find ALL of the missing locker items.
strings.achieved1: Achievement earned... You took a shortcut through a greasetrap!
strings.achieved3: Achievement earned... You found all of the golden items!
strings.achieved4: Achievement earned... You found all of the locker items!
strings.tipExit: Make your way to the exit now, me boy!
strings.tipTrap: Jump into that grease trap me boy, that's a short cut!
strings.tipTime: Time's running out me boy, you'd better hurry up!
strings.tipTimeout: Uh oh! Time's up me boy! Better luck next time!
strings.tipMints: You found one of my mints! See if you can find the others for me!
strings.tipItems: Find the 3 missing locker items on each level to open the exit, me boy!
